providers.name: RevUp Capital
providers.description: Revenue share until cap reached (non-dilutive). No fixed term, typically 3-5 year horizon.

providers.name: General Catalyst CVF
providers.description: For $50M+ ARR companies. Revenue share on new revenue until 1.5x return.

providers.name: Shopify Capital Monthly-fee
providers.description: No minimum revenue requirement. Charge a monthly fee of a percentage of the original borrow amount as long as the loan is active.

providers.name: Pipe.com
providers.description: Sell 12 months of future subscription contract income at a discount. No fixed term - repay as customers pay. equivalent to 10-15% annualized cost.

providers.name: Founderpath - 24 Month Term
providers.description: Term loan with 7-12% flat fee. 12 to 24-month repayment, no prepayment penalty.

providers.name: Capchase - 12 Month Advance
providers.description: 12-month term with 5-10% flat fee. No personal guarantees or warrants.
